ModMetaData.name: RimFantasy - Temperature Regulation
ModMetaData.author: Sierra
ModMetaData.description:
[h1]Mod Version: v1.0[/h1]
This mod adds 4 new magical gem furnitures that radiate temperature changing energies.
Moderately powerful but costly, they are capable of supporting anywhere from a small storage room to a large facility when multiple are installed. Be careful though, the energies within the crystals are barely contained and excessive damage will produce a rather spectacular explosion.
[b]Features:[/b] [list] [*]2 Pylons (Frost/Flame) [*]2 Crystal Bowls (Cold/Hot) [/list]
[b]Recommended Mods:[/b] [list] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1234567890]RimFantasy - Core[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1234567890]RimFantasy - Crystallic Lighting[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2244594116]RimTraits - Vanilla Trait Colours[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1916352291]RimTraits - Medieval Talent[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2206957172]RimTraits - General Traits[/url] [/list]
[b]Mod Compatibility:[/b] [list] [*]No Specific Issues Known. [*]Built-in support for [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2365526329]Proxy Heat[/url] [*]Probably won't play nice with other gem mod without a patch. [/list]
[b]Balance:[/b] Gems are intentionally sparse and not easy to obtain through natural means, but can be obtained through trades and from salvaging certain objects.
Balance feedbacks are welcomed, please provide context when doing so.
